Package gui

Class MainScreen

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
gui.MainScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Class implementing the main window of the system, displaying the board explored by the miner alongside important details regarding the agent's behavior (such as the counters of its actions and the contents of its "memory" or records)
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • MainScreen

      public MainScreen​(int size, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> beaconXCoors, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> beaconYCoors, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> pitXCoors, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> pitYCoors, int goldXCoor, int goldYCoor, char front)
      Creates the main window of the system, displaying the board explored by the miner alongside important details regarding the agent's behavior (such as the counters of its actions and the contents of its "memory" or records)
      Parameters:
      size - dimension of the board
      beaconXCoors - row numbers of the beacons
      beaconYCoors - column numbers of the beacons
      pitXCoors - row numbers of the pits
      pitYCoors - column numbers of the pits
      goldXCoor - row number of the gold tile
      goldYCoor - column number of the gold tile
      front - direction to which the miner is facing

  • Method Details

    • beginRationalMovement

      public void beginRationalMovement​(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> preLoadedPath)
      Updates the display depending on the action executed by the rational agent
      Parameters:
      preLoadedPath - pre-loaded sequence of actions executed by the rational agent

    • beginRandomMovement

      public void beginRandomMovement​(GameMaster game)
      Updates the display depending on the random action chosen by the nonrational agent
      Parameters:
      game - class providing access to all the methods necessary to run the system

    • moveMiner

      public void moveMiner​(int x, int y, char dir)
      Updates the display to reflect a move by the miner
      Parameters:
      x - row number of the newly occupied square tile
      y - column number of the newly occupied square tile
      dir - direction to which the miner is facing

    • rotateMiner

      public void rotateMiner​(int x, int y, char dir)
      Updates the display to reflect a (clockwise) rotation by the miner
      Parameters:
      x - row number of the square tile currently occupied by the miner
      y - column number of the square tile currently occupied by the miner
      dir - direction to which the miner is facing

    • setActionListener

      public void setActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the button in this graphical user interface
      Parameters:
      listener - action listener receiving action events

    • setWindowListener

      public void setWindowListener​(java.awt.event.WindowListener listener)
      Sets the window listener for this graphical user interface
      Parameters:
      listener - window listener receiving window events

    • setBtnEnabled

      public void setBtnEnabled​(boolean b)
      Enables (or disables) the proceed button depending on the boolean parameter passed
      Parameters:
      b - true if the PROCEED button is to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • updateNumActions

      public void updateNumActions​(java.lang.String actions)
      Updates the text log to display the number of actions executed by the miner
      Parameters:
      actions - string representation of the number of actions executed the miner

    • updateMoveSequence

      public void updateMoveSequence​(java.lang.String sequence)
      Updates the text log to display the action sequence executed by the miner
      Parameters:
      sequence - string representation of the latest entry in the miner's move sequence

    • updatePathStack

      public void updatePathStack​(java.lang.String path)
      Updates the text log to display the miner's path stack
      Parameters:
      path - string representation of the path stack

    • updateOutOfBoundsTiles

      public void updateOutOfBoundsTiles​(java.lang.String tiles)
      Updates the text log to display the out-of-bounds tiles scanned by the miner
      Parameters:
      tiles - string representation of the out-of-bounds tiles scanned by the miner

    • updateAll

      public void updateAll​(java.lang.String one, java.lang.String two, java.lang.String three, java.lang.String four)
      Updates the text log to display the consolidated details pertinent to the behavior of the agent, such as the counters of its actions and the contents of its "memory" or records
      Parameters:
      one - counters of the agent's actions
      two - string representation of the latest entry in the miner's move sequence
      three - string representation of the path stack
      four - string representation of the out-of-bounds tiles scanned by the miner
